channel.title: 彭博-市场

item.title: 白宫将公布向乌克兰提供数亿美元军事援助的一揽子计划，而争取国会提供更多援助的努力仍处于停滞状态
item.description:

item.title: 英国和印度领导人重申了他们对自由贸易协定的承诺，而几天前最新的谈判似乎还将以重大问题悬而未决而告终。

item.title: 期待已久的一批现货比特币交易所交易基金在美国推出仅两个月后，就已经开始影响加密货币市场的运作方式。
item.description:
A long awaited batch of spot Bitcoin exchange-traded funds is already influencing the way crypto markets function, just two months after they launched in the US. https://t.co/FgLOpyC1pD

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 莫桑比克批准了一项财富基金法令，规定未来十年如何使用约 917 亿美元的天然气出口收入

item.title: 英国央行行长安德鲁-贝利（Andrew Bailey）表示，英国 "接近或处于充分就业状态"，同时他还表示，他现在不太担心工资价格螺旋式上升的问题。
item.description:
The UK is “near or at full employment,” Bank of England Governor Andrew Bailey says, while also signaling he’s now less concerned about a wage price spiral developing https://t.co/Qi8Sz6mtYC

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔-普京（Vladimir Putin）表示，俄罗斯与欧佩克（OPEC）伙伴合作进行的石油减产为国家收入提供了支持，但也可能导致市场份额的损失。
item.description:
Russia’s oil-production cuts made in cooperation with OPEC partners have supported the nation’s revenue yet may result in a loss of the market share, says President Vladimir Putin https://t.co/EcmPeX4nu0

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 今日彭博交易：Nextracker首席执行官谈公开市场的生活、美国银行交易员的晋升以及EQT探索新的亚洲基金

item.title: 在前所未有的大量资金流入加密产品以及即将到来的比特币减半政策的帮助下，比特币正在保持破纪录的运行@TomMackenzieTV解释道
item.description:
Bitcoin is sustaining a record-breaking run, helped by the unprecedented amounts of capital flowing into crypto products, as well as the upcoming Bitcoin halving@TomMackenzieTV explains https://t.co/VdS9kiJgWZ pic.twitter.com/6oNaBSs2LH

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 英国正寻求购买多达 630 万支 RSV 疫苗和治疗药物，以保护婴儿和老人@ashleighfurlong 解释了为什么各国都在加强抗击该疾病的斗争。
item.description:
The UK is seeking to purchase as many as 6.3 million RSV vaccines and treatments to protect babies and elderly people@ashleighfurlong explains why nations are stepping up the fight against the disease https://t.co/85coTbwVzW pic.twitter.com/qFPyDBtjHc

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 欧盟领导人下周将呼吁对白俄罗斯、朝鲜和伊朗实施新的制裁，因为它们在帮助俄罗斯发动乌克兰战争中扮演了重要角色
item.description:
European Union leaders will next week call for new sanctions targeting Belarus, North Korea and Iran over their role in helping Russia conduct its war against Ukraine https://t.co/WmklCJj4jn

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 凤凰城的通货膨胀率曾一度领先于美国所有其他城市地区。现在，由于房价暴涨带来的降温效应，凤凰城成为通货膨胀率最低的城市之一。
item.description:
Phoenix once lead all other US metro areas in inflation. Now the city has one of the lowest rates, thanks to a cooldown from skyrocketing housing costs. https://t.co/BMITxTOXOd

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 印度 2 月份的通胀率变化不大，仍高于央行的目标，使决策者有理由保持谨慎
item.description:
India’s inflation was little changed in February, staying above the central bank’s target and giving policymakers reason to remain cautious https://t.co/4gwnwJeeWg

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 据高盛集团（Goldman Sachs）称，在经历了对利率和经济的担忧所导致的低迷之后，欧洲商业地产的估值已接近底部。
item.description:
European commercial real estate valuations are close to a bottom after a slump driven by worries about interest rates and the economy, according to Goldman Sachs https://t.co/VDJpX0KCFj

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 波多黎各破产电力局提出的债务重组计划包括一种 "涡轮 "融资，可作为其他公用事业公司的蓝图
item.description:
The debt-restructuring plan put forward by Puerto Rico’s bankrupt power authority includes a type of "turbo" financing that may serve as a blueprint for other utilities https://t.co/A02aRB4OAg

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 预算监督机构警告说，由于缺乏详细的支出计划，英国的公共服务有可能陷入 "未知领域"，并危及公共财政。
item.description:
A lack of detailed spending plans threatens to plunge Britain’s public services into “unknown territory” and put the public finances at risk, the budget watchdog warns https://t.co/K6UD2ePeOI

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 一个名为 Bitcoin Fog 的加密货币混合服务公司的创始人在华盛顿联邦法院被判犯有帮助以销售非法毒品著称的暗网市场洗钱数千万美元的罪行。
item.description:
The founder of a cryptocurrency mixing service known as Bitcoin Fog was convicted in Washington federal court of helping to launder tens of millions of dollars from darknet markets known for selling illegal drugs. https://t.co/JT9TBdVuLs

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 真主党向以色列军事地点发射了一百多枚导弹，这是这个以黎巴嫩为基地的组织近几个月来发动的最猛烈攻击之一
item.description:
Hezbollah launches more than a hundred missiles at Israeli military sites in one of the Lebanon-based group’s heaviest assaults in recent months https://t.co/9Gr09L9WcR

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 尽管欧盟议会威胁要提起诉讼，但欧盟仍坚持其决定，解冻匈牙利被暂停的约三分之一的资金
item.description:
The EU is sticking by its decision to unlock about a third of Hungary’s suspended funding despite a threatened lawsuit by the bloc's parliament https://t.co/yJ0welIgAF

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 智利经济学家打赌，比索疲软和连续出现的通胀意外将迫使央行在下个月放慢降息步伐

item.title: 在华尔街众多预测者纷纷上调对美股的乐观预期之际，摩根士丹利的迈克-威尔逊（Mike Wilson）却不为所动，他认为在缺乏广泛盈利增长的情况下，没有理由上调其前景预期。
item.description:
As a flurry of Wall Street forecasters bump up their optimism toward US stocks in lockstep, Morgan Stanley’s Mike Wilson won’t budge, arguing he sees no justification to upgrade his outlook given an absence of broad earnings growth https://t.co/3dvtJqCMsP

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 自阿里尔-亨利（Ariel Henry）总理因谋杀案上台以来，海地的动荡局势愈演愈烈。他说他要辞职。接下来会发生什么？
item.description:
The turmoil in Haiti has accelerated since a murder brought Prime Minister Ariel Henry to power. He says he's resigning. What's next? https://t.co/wRgS0S1Yw0

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 安哥拉政府正准备出售外币债券，以缓解这个产油国的本币压力
item.description:
Angola’s government is preparing the sale of foreign currency bonds as the oil-producing nation tries to ease the pressure on the local currency https://t.co/YE7UwIb8Qz

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 南非因修改政治资金法而面临推迟五月大选的风险

South Africa risks delaying its May election with a change to political funding laws https://t.co/eaVwgmdpln

item.title: 埃马纽埃尔-马克龙一直以极右翼的解毒剂自居。但随着玛丽娜-勒庞比以往任何时候都更接近总统宝座，这位亲商界的总统在 2027 年任期结束时还能留下什么呢？
item.description:
Emmanuel Macron s'est toujours présenté comme l'antidote à l'extrême droite. Mais avec une Marine Le Pen qui n'a jamais été aussi proche de ravir la présidence, que restera-t-il de l'héritage du président pro-business à la fin de son mandat, en 2027 ? https://t.co/qTKwfwnzRg

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024
